mapper.select: INSERT INTO auction (auction_name, start_date, deadline_date, a_starting_price, a_max_price, bid_price, product_id, farm_id) VALUES (#{auction_name}, #{start_date}, #{deadline_date}, #{a_starting_price}, #{a_max_price}, #{bid_price}, #{productDTO.product_id}, #{farm_id}) RETURNING auction_Id, deadline_date

SELECT * FROM auction a, product p, farm_member f WHERE a.product_id = p.product_id and a.farm_id = f.farm_id and a.deadline_date > NOW() ORDER BY ABS(DATEDIFF(NOW(), deadline_date)) LIMIT #{startLimit}, 2
mapper.update: UPDATE auction SET start_date= #{start_date}, deadline_date = #{deadline_date}, a_starting_price = #{a_starting_price}, winning_bid = #{winning_bid}, bid_num = #{bid_num}, realtime_price = #{realtime_price} WHERE auction_Id = #{auction_Id}
UPDATE auction SET bid_price= #{bid_price}, consumer_id = #{consumer_id}, bid_num = bid_num + 1 WHERE auction_Id = #{auction_Id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product, product_kg, p_drop_date, size, p_status, p_explanation, product_img_name, farm_id) VALUES (#{product}, #{product_kg}, #{p_drop_date}, #{size}, #{p_status}, #{p_explanation}, #{product_img_name}, #{farm_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE auction SET p_name= #{p_name}, product = #{product}, product_kg = #{product_kg}, p_drop_date = #{p_drop_date}, size = #{size}, p_status = #{p_status}, p_explanation = #{p_explanation}, product_img_name = #{product_img_name}, WHERE product_id = #{product_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auction_review (auction_Id, grade_point, consumer_review) VALUES (#{auction_Id}, #{grade_point}, #{consumer_review})
mapper.select: SELECT a.auction_Id, a.auction_name, p.product_img_name, a_r.grade_point, a_r.consumer_review, a_r.farm_review, f.f_name, f.f_phonenum FROM auction_review a_r, auction a, product p, farm_member f WHERE a_r.auction_Id = a.auction_Id and a.product_id = p.product_id and a.farm_id = f.farm_id and a.consumer_id = #{consumer_id} ORDER BY ABS(DATEDIFF(NOW(), deadline_date))

SELECT a.auction_Id, a.auction_name, p.product_img_name, a_r.grade_point, a_r.consumer_review, a_r.farm_review, c.c_name FROM auction_review a_r, auction a, product p, consumer_member c WHERE a_r.auction_Id = a.auction_Id and a.product_id = p.product_id and a.consumer_id = c.consumer_id and a.farm_id = #{farm_id} ORDER BY ABS(DATEDIFF(NOW(), deadline_date))
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM auction_review WHERE auction_Id = #{auction_Id}, consumer_id = #{consumer_Id}
mapper.select: INSERT INTO alert (d_status, auction_Id, consumer_id, auction_name) VALUES (#{d_status}, #{auction_Id}, #{consumer_id}, #{auction_name}) RETURNING alert_id, d_status, auction_Id, consumer_id, auction_name
SELECT time FROM alert WHERE alert_id = #{alert_id}
SELECT auction_Id, deadline_date FROM auction WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, deadline_date, NOW()) < 3000 ORDER BY TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, deadline_date, NOW());

SELECT * FROM auction AS a INNER JOIN product AS p ON a.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN auction_review AS a_r ON a.auction_id = a_r.auction_id WHERE a.consumer_id = #{consumer_id} ORDER BY ABS(DATEDIFF(NOW(), deadline_date)) LIMIT #{startLimit}, 5

SELECT * FROM auction AS a INNER JOIN product AS p ON a.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN auction_review AS a_r ON a.auction_id = a_r.auction_id WHERE a.farm_id = #{farm_id} ORDER BY ABS(DATEDIFF(NOW(), deadline_date)) LIMIT #{startLimit}, 5
SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM wish WHERE auction_id=#{auction_id} and consumer_Id=#{consumer_id})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wish WHERE consumer_id = #{consumer_id} and auction_id = #{auction_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM auction a, product p, wish w WHERE a.auction_id = w.auction_id and a.product_id = p.product_id and w.consumer_id = #{consumer_id} ORDER BY ABS(DATEDIFF(NOW(), deadline_date)) LIMIT #{startLimit}, 5
